name: Happy Fishing (itch)
description:
Happy Fishing - "Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others."  Happy Fishing is an arcade-fishing game. Cat angel catches not only fishes but happiness. Help her and share the secret of happy life.    

 How to Play

  When a fish bites, then down your mouse. But if the bar showing a tension of the fishing line reaches to the limit, then release your mouse.
